function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Compliance with lockdown measures influenced by fear of disease, moral support, and social norms.","Impact":"Inadequate compliance could lead to increased spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Provide education and awareness campaigns to strengthen intrinsic motivation for compliance, and enforce measures to reduce opportunities for rule-breaking.","Technologies":"Digital tools for public health communication and monitoring compliance.","People":"General public, especially those with lower self-control.","Owner":"Public health authorities and local governments."},{"Description":"Lower self-control leading to non-compliance with lockdown measures.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion due to higher likelihood of rule-breaking behavior.","Mitigation":"Provide targeted support and resources for individuals with lower self-control, and enhance enforcement of rules and regulations.","Technologies":"Behavioral tracking and intervention apps, community support networks.","People":"Individuals with lower self-control, at-risk populations.","Owner":"Community organizations, social service agencies, and public health authorities."}]}
